snippet: Botox, the wrinkle treatment made by Allergan, has been approved to treat adults with overactive bladders who cannot tolerate or were not helped by other drugs.
abstract: Botox, wrinkle treatment made by Allergan, is approved to treat adults with overactive bladders who cannot tolerate or were not helped by other drugs.
lead_paragraph: Botox, the wrinkle treatment made by Allergan, has been approved to treat adults with overactive bladders who cannot tolerate or were not helped by other drugs.

headline.main: F.D.A. Clears Botox to Help Bladder Control
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Clears Botox To Help Bladder Control
